actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution providing that the Speaker of the House certify the Report of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct with respect to the proceedings against O. Robert Fordiani, to the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House to certify a specified report to the U.S. Attorney for the District of Columbia for the prosecution of O. Robert Fordiani for his failure to obey a lawful subpoena of the House and to testify before the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

titles.title: A resolution providing that the Speaker of the House certify the Report of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct with respect to the proceedings against O. Robert Fordiani, to the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia.
